about_the_game:
◆Season Pass Bonus◆
Get your hands on various useful Modifications to enhance your Unit's movement from the Group Dispatches in Added Dispatch: Get Movement Modification Mission!
•[Supply Part] Accel Drive: If equipped unit has less than 250 Maneuverability, then Mobility +1.
•[Supply Part] MS EX Booster I: Mobility +1. Maneuverability -25.
•[Supply Part] MS EX Booster II: Mobility +2. Maneuverability -50.
•[Supply Part] Standard EX Booster: Mobility +1

Get your hands on additional DLC from the "Added Dispatch Mission Sets" of the Season Pass!
Acquire new units/characters, BGM, Modifications, Character Abilities, and many more from the newly added "Dispatch Mission" of "Added Dispatch Mission Set."

Perform Group Dispatches after creating the group in Form Groups. The group will return with various rewards after the "Dispatch Time" set for each mission.

◆Season Pass Contents◆
・[Added Dispatch Mission Set ①]
・[Added Dispatch Mission Set ②]
・[Added Dispatch Mission Set ③]
・[Added Dispatch Mission Set ④]

*Some items can be obtained after clearing certain conditions in the game.
detailed_description:
◆Season Pass Bonus◆
Get your hands on various useful Modifications to enhance your Unit's movement from the Group Dispatches in Added Dispatch: Get Movement Modification Mission!
•[Supply Part] Accel Drive: If equipped unit has less than 250 Maneuverability, then Mobility +1.
•[Supply Part] MS EX Booster I: Mobility +1. Maneuverability -25.
•[Supply Part] MS EX Booster II: Mobility +2. Maneuverability -50.
•[Supply Part] Standard EX Booster: Mobility +1

Get your hands on additional DLC from the "Added Dispatch Mission Sets" of the Season Pass!
Acquire new units/characters, BGM, Modifications, Character Abilities, and many more from the newly added "Dispatch Mission" of "Added Dispatch Mission Set."

Perform Group Dispatches after creating the group in Form Groups. The group will return with various rewards after the "Dispatch Time" set for each mission.

◆Season Pass Contents◆

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or Radeon HD 7570
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750 or Radeon HD 7790

publishers: 株式会社バンダイナムコエンターテインメント
short_description: A Season Pass that gets you the upcoming paid DLC “Added Dispatch Missions”.
